name: API Anikii

overview.description: API Anikii is the backend service powering the Anikii website. Developed in Python using FastAPI, it seamlessly integrates with the AniList API to fetch and deliver rich data to the frontend. Its design emphasizes performance, reliability, and scalability, ensuring that the user experience on the website remains smooth and responsive.
keyFeatures: RESTful endpoints for efficient data retrieval
Integration with AniList API for up-to-date media data
Built with Python and FastAPI for rapid development
Containerized deployment using Docker for consistent environments

updateFeatures: Launched initial version with core RESTful endpoints
Integrated AniList API for dynamic content sourcing

futureGoals: Expand API endpoints to support additional features on the frontend
Implement advanced caching mechanisms to further improve performance
Enhance logging, monitoring, and automated testing
Explore integration with additional third-party data sources
Deploy CI/CD pipelines for streamlined updates and maintenance
